About Me

Hi, my name’s Keonho and I’m a junior Ai Engineer.

I have experience in development and artificial intelligence and am currently in charge of LLM artificial intelligence development in my startup.

I am most skilled in:

Diclosed Project in KDCA

Infectious Disease Pandemic Outcome Prediction Project

A project aimed at predicting the occurrence of infectious diseases caused by pandemics using regression analysis and machine learning techniques applied to tabular data.

Analysis of the frequency of dengue fever among domestic travelers

Investigation into the frequency and spread of dengue fever among domestic travelers to understand the epidemiological dynamics of the disease.

A predictive program for future norovirus outbreaks based on changes in the timing of norovirus epidemics due to the coronavirus pandemic

Development of a predictive program to anticipate future outbreaks of norovirus by considering the impact of the coronavirus pandemic on the timing and patterns of norovirus epidemics.

Analysis of Domestic Infectious Disease Statistics Using Foreign Resident Residence Status Data

Examination of domestic infectious disease statistics with a focus on analyzing data related to the residency status of foreign residents to identify potential patterns or correlations.

Details of all projects carried out by KDCA are Confidential and cannot be disclosed.

Experience

Korea Disease Control and Prevention Agency

Data Analyst intern

November 2023 - January 2024

"Experience is not what happens to you; it's what you do with what happens to you."

As a Data Analyst intern at the Korea Disease Control and Prevention Agency, I was involved in various projects related to data analysis and interpretation. My responsibilities included collecting, cleaning, and analyzing data to identify trends and patterns that could inform public health strategies. I also collaborated with other team members to produce reports and presentations summarizing our findings and recommendations.

Bionutrion

LLM Ai Engineer

April 2024 - Currently in progress

"The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step."

Bionutrion is a company developing digital therapeutic devices related to nutrition. As an LLM AI Engineer, my role involves developing and implementing machine learning algorithms to analyze nutritional data and provide personalized recommendations for users. I work closely with a multidisciplinary team to design and optimize algorithms that improve the effectiveness of our digital therapeutic solutions.

Through coursework, projects, and internships, I developed skills in data analysis, problem-solving, and interdisciplinary collaboration, preparing me for a career in the healthcare industry.

Completion of S/W development and application expert training using medical bio-AI (KDT)

Linked to Chungbuk National University Hospital

February 2023 - July 2023

"Continuous learning is the key to unlocking your full potential."

During the S/W development and application expert training using medical bio-AI (KDT) program, I acquired advanced skills in software development and applications, specifically focused on medical bioinformatics and artificial intelligence. The program, linked to Chungbuk National University Hospital, provided hands-on training and practical experience in developing software solutions for medical data analysis and interpretation. Through this intensive training, I enhanced my understanding of medical informatics and AI technologies, preparing me to contribute effectively to healthcare innovation.

During this intensive program, I gained practical experience in creating interactive dashboards, designing insightful visualizations, and interpreting data to drive business decisions. Through hands-on projects and exercises, I developed proficiency in using Tableau to analyze complex datasets and communicate findings effectively to stakeholders.
